text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Multiple forms that depends on the family of the Plant it's currently facing. Turn page for details.
$(br)$(#bd951a)She always wanted to be a famous makeup artist, posting selfies dyed all sorts of different colors, but doesn't know that everyone prefers her in her natural color.

pages.title: ‚è≥ Contain Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Impatyens are versatile Plants that change their strengths based on nearby Plants.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Conceal: $()$(#ff0000)Wets Zombies. No Splash. -2 Damage. Infinite Pierce.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Enforce: $()$(#ff0000)Wets Zombies. No Splash. +6 Damage. 7 Blocks Range.
$(#bd951a)Reinforce: $()$(#ff0000)Wets Zombies. 0.5s Stun to Zombie directly damaged.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Enlighten: $()$(#ff0000)Wets Zombies. -2 Damage. +2 Splash Damage. Can damage Stealthing Zombies.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Filament: $()$(#ff0000)Electrocutes Zombies (5 Radius, 3 Chains, 4 DMG). No Splash.
